CustomField.description: Indicates if the LOB entered on the opportunity had revenue since the first day of the prior year. If it does not have revenue it is flagged as a LOB Cross Sell.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the LOB entered on the opportunity had revenue since the first day of the prior year. If it does not have revenue it is flagged as a LOB Cross Sell.
CustomField.label: New LOB Opportunity
